TXT_PREMIUM_LONG: With Marco Skies apartments we aim to offer you a quality lifestyle. Our kitchen has been upgraded and equipped with Miele stainless steel kitchen appliances, Fisher Paykel fridge and finished with marble benchtop and splashback and selected veneer joinery. Rain shower and heated three rail chrome tower rail are installed in all bathrooms.
TXT_APARTMENT_LONG: Marco Skies apartments offer the purchaser a lifestyle of superb quality. Marco Skies apartment kitchens have been enhanced with Miele stainless steel kitchen appliances, a Fisher Paykel integrated fridge and finished with marble benchtops and splashbacks and selected veneer joinery. A rain shower, marble vanity and heated three rail chrome towel rail are installed in all bathrooms.
TXT_COMMUNITY_LONG: The Podium Club offers exclusive access for residents and a sensational array of first class leisure and entertainment spaces overlooking the city. Featuring a breathtaking infinity pool, stunning gym facilities with glass rood, elegantly furnished private dining room and luxurious cinema, you are sure to be impressed.
TXT_LOCATION_LONG: Marco Skies apartments are located on the top floor levels of the Marco Melbourne apartments. Marco Melbourne is superbly positioned in Melbourne’s premier inner-city precinct Southbank with numerous services available nearby. As well Melbourne City Council has granted approval for a mega shopping centre development including a supermarket, retail shops with food court, childcare centre and offices to be built nearby.
TXT_VIDEO_TEXT: MARCO SKIES - A SUPERB QUALITY RESIDENTIAL ADDRESS THAT IS DESIGNED TO SHINE.
TXT_EXCEPTIONAL_LIVING_LONG: Majestic views of the Melbourne city skyline provide an ever-changing vista and that, combined with the high quality finishes in Marco Skies, offer apartment living of another standard. With the warmth of timber veneers that glow, the kitchen adds another dimension to an already timeless quality. Beautiful Oak parquetry timber floors compliment the ambient lighting and the mellow tones.
TXT_DISCOVER_EXCEPTIONAL_LONG: Dive into all the action of modern city living in Melbourne, the world’s most liveable city. experience the astonishing array of exciting offers at Crown Casino. Stroll through Southgate’s Shopping Complex, or take in the spectacular attractions of the renowned Arts Precinct. Slip across the river and explore the hidden treasures of the CBD’s intriguing laneways. Discover secret bars, world-famous restaurants and historic theatres. Spend a sunny afternoon at Albert Park Lake and golf course. Picnic in the gorgeous Royal Botanic Gardens. Enjoy incredible access to Melbourne’s oldest universities, best fresh food markets, and the country’s greatest sporting arenas.
TXT_EXCEPTIONAL_COLLABORATION_DEVELOPER_: Combining an extensive range of property experience, both in Australia and overseas, with a commitment to the highest quality outcomes for all stakeholders, Golden Sunrise Development brings the ability to deliver on a vision of outstanding large-scale, multi-purpose projects, with a focus on green, energy efficient buildings that achieve a sustainable legacy long into the future.
TXT_EXCEPTIONAL_COLLABORATION_ARCHITECT_: The Buchan Group is one of the largest architectural groups in Australasia and is widely recognised for its design excellence and depth of experience across an extensive portfolio of large scale developments. With a track record of outstanding service that extends back to 1890, the Buchan Group today is an interdisciplinary design powerhouse servicing clients throughout Australia, New Zealand, South-East Asia, the Middle East and the united Kingdom.
TXT_GALLERY_LONG: We are a fun mix of designers and strategists with a great passion for all things creative
TXT_LOCATION_TEXT: Dive into all the action of modern city living in Melbourne
